descr: "Demographics and other administrative information about an individual or animal receiving care or other health-related services."

fields.name: resourceType
fields.descr: "This is a Patient resource"

fields.name: identifier
fields.descr: "An identifier for this patient."

fields.name: active
fields.descr: "Whether this patient record is in active use."

fields.name: name
fields.descr: "A name associated with the individual."

fields.name: telecom
fields.descr: "A contact detail (e.g. a telephone number or an email address) by which the individual may be contacted."

fields.name: gender
fields.descr: "Administrative Gender - the gender that the patient is considered to have for administration and record keeping purposes."

fields.name: birthDate
fields.descr: "The date of birth for the individual."

fields.name: deceasedBoolean
fields.descr: "Indicates if the individual is deceased or not."

fields.name: deceasedDateTime
fields.descr: "Indicates if the individual is deceased or not."

fields.name: address
fields.descr: "Addresses for the individual."

fields.name: maritalStatus
fields.descr: "This field contains a patient's most recent marital (civil) status."

fields.name: multipleBirthBoolean
fields.descr: "Indicates whether the patient is part of a multiple (bool) or indicates the actual birth order (integer)."

fields.name: multipleBirthInteger
fields.descr: "Indicates whether the patient is part of a multiple (bool) or indicates the actual birth order (integer)."

fields.name: photo
fields.descr: "Image of the patient."

fields.name: contact
fields.descr: "A contact party (e.g. guardian, partner, friend) for the patient."

fields.name: animal
fields.descr: "This patient is known to be an animal."

fields.name: communication
fields.descr: "Languages which may be used to communicate with the patient about his or her health."

fields.name: generalPractitioner
fields.descr: "Patient's nominated care provider."

fields.name: managingOrganization
fields.descr: "Organization that is the custodian of the patient record."

fields.name: link
fields.descr: "Link to another patient resource that concerns the same actual patient."

fields.name: text
fields.descr:
"A human-readable narrative that contains a summary of the resource, and may be used to represent the content of the resource to a human. The narrative need not encode all the structured data, but is required to contain sufficient detail to make it \"clinically safe\" for a human to just read the narrative. Resource definitions may define what content should be represented in the narrative to ensure clinical safety."
 derived from DomainResource

fields.name: contained
fields.descr:
"These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope."
 derived from DomainResource

fields.name: extension
fields.descr:
"May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource. In order to make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension."
 derived from DomainResource

fields.name: modifierExtension
fields.descr:
"May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource, and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. In order to make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions."
 derived from DomainResource

fields.name: id
fields.descr:
"The logical id of the resource, as used in the URL for the resource. Once assigned, this value never changes."
 derived from Resource

fields.name: meta
fields.descr:
"The metadata about the resource. This is content that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content may not always be associated with version changes to the resource."

fields.name: implicitRules
fields.descr:
"A reference to a set of rules that were followed when the resource was constructed, and which must be understood when processing the content."
 derived from Resource
 derived from DomainResource

fields.name: language
fields.descr:
"The base language in which the resource is written."

searches.name: active
searches.descr: Whether the patient record is active

searches.name: deathdate
searches.descr: The date of death has been provided and satisfies this search value

searches.name: deceased
searches.descr: This patient has been marked as deceased, or as a death date entered

searches.name: generalpractitioner
searches.descr: Patient's nominated general practitioner, not the organization that manages the record

searches.name: link
searches.descr: All patients linked to the given patient

searches.name: name
searches.descr: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, give, prefix, suffix, suffix, and/or text

searches.name: organization
searches.descr: The organization at which this person is a patient
